Week 10.Describe your feelings: I am feeling both excited and anxious about the pregnancy. It's a big decision to make as a single mom, but I am trying to stay positive.
Week 10.Describe any symptoms: I have been experiencing bouts of nausea, especially in the mornings. Fatigue has also been a constant companion, making it challenging to keep up with daily tasks. My mood swings are more pronounced this week.
Week 10.Highlight of the week: This week, I had my first ultrasound and saw the tiny heartbeat of the baby. It was a moment filled with both joy and a sense of responsibility.
Week 10.My Goal: To make a decision about the pregnancy
Week 10.Your goal: My goal for this week is to carefully consider all my options regarding the pregnancy and make a decision that is best for me and my child.
To Do List: Schedule an appointment with a counselor
Discuss with my boyfriend about our future plans
Week 10.Notes: This is a crucial time for me, and I am trying to gather all the support and information I need to make an informed decision. It's important for me to take care of myself both emotionally and physically during this time.
